original: Hetuṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: hetum sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na hetum sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca nahetuṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetum sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca na hetum sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
sahajāta vāram pi pe pañhā vāram pi

original: Hetuṁ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetum dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi sabbattha vitthāro

original: Hetuṁ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetum adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi sabbattha vitthāro
